supplies.name: SuperBreak Backpack
supplies.description: The JanSport SuperBreak Backpack is a classic style backpack that is perfect for school. It has a large main compartment and a front pocket with organizer to keep your supplies in order. The backpack is made of durable fabric and has padded shoulder straps for comfort.

supplies.name: Hustle 5.0 Backpack
supplies.description: The Under Armour Hustle 5.0 Backpack is a great choice for students who need a durable and spacious backpack. It has a large main compartment with a soft-lined laptop sleeve, a front pocket with organizer, and two side water bottle pockets. The backpack is made of tough, water-resistant fabric and has padded HeatGear shoulder straps for comfort.

supplies.name: Little America Backpack
supplies.description: The Herschel Supply Co. Little America Backpack is a stylish and functional backpack that is perfect for school. It has a large main compartment with a padded laptop sleeve, a front pocket with hidden zipper and key clip, and a media pocket with headphone port. The backpack is made of durable polyester and has contoured shoulder straps and a padded back panel for comfort.

supplies.name: Brasilia Backpack
supplies.description: The Nike Brasilia Backpack is a sporty and functional backpack that is great for athletes and students. It has a large main compartment with a padded laptop sleeve, a front pocket with organizer, and two side pockets for water bottles. The backpack is made of durable polyester and has padded shoulder straps and a back panel for comfort.

supplies.name: Old Skool Backpack
supplies.description: The Vans Old Skool Backpack is a stylish and functional backpack that is perfect for school. It has a large main compartment with a laptop sleeve, a front zippered pocket, and side water bottle pockets. The backpack is made of durable polyester and has padded shoulder straps and a back panel for comfort.
